name: good game
description:
good game
some positive-good-karma-energy flowed out of control fromout some source - made flowers, plants, vegetables/fruits and insects grow bigger and come mad-happy-alive - some of them can hardly control this living-energy and stay restfull-happy - you also got affected - can blast energywaves - and cant stop smiling and knowing how funny it all is - and feel drawn-forced-compelled to find out the source of this.

2D-action-platformer like mario and cuphead - more jumping on enemies/projectiles then shooting enemies - about timing-predicting-estamating physics-trajectories and even having some luck with the randomizers - depending on the difficulty, one recieves some shots that one has to be wise with.

new fun enemies and bosses every level - mostly based on flowers, vegetables/fruits and insects that everyone knows.
unique over the top never seen before - totally mad amounts of enemies and projectiles - 2D-platform-action that makes one - wonder if not the right time to blast energywaves!!

funny (old-)cartoon sound effects and (old-)piano music

multiple-difficulty modes - with each difficulty-mode great changes in the level - with the enemies and the boss especially - besides the amount of health/shots at start and able to gain in the level - so its playable for both kids and for more experienced gamers and has greater-challenging replay value.
+ easy difficulty modes with many lives and shots
+ the difficulty mode - totally mad - in which one get one life and one shot more then the typical 3 with hard-mode and more hidden life's to gain in the levels.
